title: USA Flag Watch Face
summary: Display your Patriotism all the time
description: This attractive US Flag watch face has been designed to show your patriotism. Your smartwatch display with the star spangled banner will soar your enthusiasm for all things American, all the time.
descriptionHTML: This attractive US Flag watch face has been designed to show your patriotism. Your smartwatch display with the star spangled banner will soar your enthusiasm for all things American, all the time.
comments: Once installed you can't find it and it doesn't appear on your watch
Lol installs and the watch face is nowhere to be found.
